tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TherapySessionNotes (
  session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  therapist_name VARCHAR(50),
  session_date DATE,
  progress_report TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE progress_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  session_id INT,
  therapist_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  progress_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ProgressReports (
  report_id INT,
  session_id INT,
  therapist_id INT,
  report_date DATE,
  progress TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Sessions (
  session_id INT,
  therapist_id INT,
  client_id INT,
  session_date DATE,
  session_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE session_notes (
  session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  therapist_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  notes TEXT,
  date_created TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE progress_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  session_id INT,
  therapist_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  progress TEXT,
  date_created TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  dob DATE,
  address TEXT,
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE sessions (
  session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  therapist_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  session_date DATE,
  duration_minutes INT
);
